info.author: pediapress.com
info.description:
.. -*- mode: rst; coding: utf-8 -*-

======================================================================
mwlib.epub - epub file writer
======================================================================

mwlib.epub provides epub rendering for mwlib.


Installation
======================================================================

Required software:

lxml is required which in turn requires libxml2-dev libxslt-dev

pytidylib requires HTML tidy from http://tidy.sourceforge.net/

info.name: mwlib.epub
info.summary: generate epub files from mediawiki markup
